pageProduct.name: Trilogy Vitamin C Revitalising Eye Gel 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Trilogy's certified natural Vitamin C Revitalising Eye Gel refreshes, hydrates and brightens delicate skin around the eyes.

Delivered via a cooling ceramic applicator, this hydrating eye gel helps energise dark circles and reduce the look of puffiness with circles antioxidant vitamin C, refreshing aloe vera and plumping hyaluronic acid.

Suitable for all skin types, especially those with tired, puffy eyes or those who prefer a lightweight gel textured eye product.

Key Benefits:
- Refreshes and brightens
- Plumps and hydrates
- Cools and reduces the look of puffiness

Warnings

To ensure compatibility we recommend patch testing before use. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse immediately if product comes in contact with them.

In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, discontinue use and consult your medical professional. All toiletry products have an effect on the environment. Always use the correct amount for maximum efficiency and minimum environmental impact.
Store below 30°C.

Common Uses

The cooling ceramic applicator along with aloe vera juice will help reduce the look of puffiness and refresh your eye area, while the hyaluronic acid will help plump and hydrate

Ingredients

Aqua (water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Bellis Perennis (Daisy) Flower Extract , Xanthan Gum, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Benzyl Alcohol*, Dehydroacetic Acid*
*Preserved with Dehydroacetic acid (and) Benzyl alcohol

Directions

Gently squeeze tube, sweep and massage product on applicator across undereye area. Tap any excess with fingertips.
